member.name: P:Contract.BaseJob.MachineName
member.summary: Client machine name. Used when reporting progress updates

member.name: P:Contract.BaseJob.Progress
member.summary: Progress of how many seconds has been encoded Used when reporting progress updates

member.name: P:Contract.JobRequest.AudioSourceFilename
member.summary: Source for audio. This is optional and if specified, the audio from the video file will be discarded and this will be the audio track in the output instead

member.name: P:Contract.JobRequest.Needed
member.summary: Latest timestamp when the output files are needed This will be used to prioritize requests when there is a queue

member.name: P:Contract.JobRequest.Targets
member.summary: One or more target resolutions and bitrates

member.name: P:Contract.JobRequest.X264Preset
member.summary: Preset for X264. One of ultrafast, superfast, veryfast, faster, fast, medium, slow, slower, veryslow, placebo. See http://dev.beandog.org/x264_preset_reference.html for description

member.name: P:Contract.JobRequest.EnableDash
member.summary: Whether the output should support MPEG DASH

member.name: P:Contract.JobRequest.EnableTwoPass
member.summary: Whether FFmpeg should use 2 pass encoding

member.name: P:Contract.JobRequest.EnablePsnr
member.summary: Whether to calculate PSNR values for each output file
